metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2459 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in Prompts in Google Chrome prior to113.0.5672.63 allowed a remote attacker to bypass permission restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
